definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

pinyin: Bo1 si1 ni2 ya4 he2 Hei1 sai4 ge1 wei2 na4
containing_words.word: 波斯尼亞和黑塞哥維那

definition: Republic of Bosnia and Herzegovina (1992-1995), predecessor of Bosnia and Herzegovina 波斯尼亞和黑塞哥維那|波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那[Bo1 si1 ni2 ya4 he2 Hei1 sai4 ge1 wei2 na4]
pinyin: Bo1 si1 ni2 ya4 he2 Hei1 sai4 ge1 wei2 na4 Gong4 he2 guo2
containing_words.word: 波斯尼亞和黑塞哥維那共和國

pinyin: Bo1 si1 pu3 lu3 si1 Hai3 xia2

sentences.english: When Bela died, Jobab son of Zerah from Bozrah succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 比拉死了，波斯拉人謝拉的兒子約巴接續他作王。

sentences.english: As far as I know, none has been translated.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，我的作品還沒有波斯文譯本。

sentences.english: Former Bosnian Serb general Ratko Mladic spent sixteen years in hiding.
sentences.chinese: 前波斯尼亞塞族將軍姆拉迪奇藏匿花了十六年。

sentences.english: He created the Persian Empire, one of the most splendid the world has ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 他建立了一個當時世界史上空前輝煌燦爛的波斯帝國。

sentences.english: A Persian cat is all very well, I said; but a Persian cat is not enough.
sentences.chinese: 我是說，一隻波斯貓的確很好，但卻遠遠不夠。

sentences.english: F.C. Hall told Post he could use the plane to enter flight competitions.
sentences.chinese: 霍爾對波斯特說，他可以用這架飛機參加飛行比賽。

sentences.english: Smerdis and his forces were defeated by the Persians under Darius I.
sentences.chinese: 士馬特斯和他的軍隊被大流士一世領導下的波斯打敗。

sentences.english: He recollected Cronshaw's whimsical metaphor of the Persian carpet.
sentences.chinese: 他回憶克朗肖經常談起的那個波斯地毯的寓言。

sentences.english: They won't have a Persian cat.
It was illegal according to the Persian Law.
sentences.chinese: 根據波斯法律，這是不合法的，要被殺頭的。

sentences.english: I love chinese people and the culture they are the same as Iranian and ancient persia.
sentences.chinese: 我愛中國人民，他們的文化和伊朗和古波斯是一致的。

sentences.english: Patty, the people at the party were all friends of his.
sentences.chinese: 帕蒂，派對上的人都是波斯特家人的朋友。

sentences.english: The name Mithras was the Persian word for 'contract'.
sentences.chinese: 密特拉神的名字波斯語叫做“盟約”。

sentences.english: And for example flat caps and some coronets, stem from Persia and Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 又如平頂帽和一些頭飾，均來源於波斯和阿富汗。

sentences.english: The Assyrians and Persians developed tree-filled parks for hunting on horseback.
sentences.chinese: 亞述人以及波斯人營造出爲騎馬打獵而專用的樹林。

sentences.english: They will have a Persian cat.

definition: Sassanid Empire of Persia (c. 2nd-7th century AD)
Abbasid Empire (750-1258), successor of the Umayyad caliphate

pinyin: Mei3 suo3 bu4 da2 mi3 ya4

definition: Phoenicia, ancient civilization along the coast of the Mediterranean Sea
Western Regions (Han Dynasty term for regions beyond Yumen Pass 玉門關|玉门关[Yu4 men2 Guan1])
Bokhara or Bukhara city in Uzbekistan
